description: Guard Against Wandering Eyes Keep the information displayed on your screen to yourself with 4-Way Privacy. When viewed straight on, the overlay allows your screen to remain bright and clear. But at a horizontal or vertical angle, it makes sure strangers can't see it.Defend Your Device Avoid damage without affecting your touchscreen's functionality. Strong yet thin and lightweight, the overlay provides excellent protection that will help keep your device looking like new.Tru Clear See your screen, not the overlay. Tru Clear technology ensures optimal screen visibility. Fast Install Applying the overlay is fast and easy. Simply clean your phone screen with the included cleaning wipe, peel the overlay from its backing and place it onto your screen. Then use the included smoothing card to push away creases and bubbles.
title: Belkin 4-Way Privacy Screen Protector for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation
